post.title: Version

body.raw:
The latest news, updates, and changes on Kata Omnichat

## 2.5.5

<ImageWrapper>
  <NextImage
    src="/assets/images/products/kata-omnichat/release-notes/kata-omnichat-illustration.webp"
    alt="Kata-Omnichat Illustration"
    naturalHeight={464}
    naturalWidth={1440}
  />
</ImageWrapper>

### Whatâ€™s New â­ï¸

Are you a business owner? Do you have many agents for some messaging platforms to handle customersâ€™ inquiries? Or even, do you sometimes need a bot for your Instagram Business Messaging and WhatsApp Business API to help your agents with some repeated questions? ðŸ¤”

This new product is definitely suitable for you! ðŸŽ‰

Weâ€™re building Kata Omnichat 2.0, so it will be the replacement for the old one. This centralized agent dashboard will help your agents respond to any customersâ€™ inquiries rapidly without switching from one messaging app to another messaging app. Also, if needed, an agent bot will be a savior to collaborate with your agents. Learn more about [Agent Bot](/kata-omnichat/configure-your-agent-chatbot/setup-agent-bot-in-kata-omnichat).

### Whatâ€™s been fixed ðŸ› 

Changing the whole user experience to make it seamless and easier for you and your agents and having two most popular messaging platforms; Instagram Messaging and WhatsApp Business. This product will be very flexible for you, you donâ€™t need to have a bot at the first time, but you can add it anytime you need it.

Weâ€™re updating some bugs in Kata Omnichat 2.0:

- Fixed users canâ€™t download reports to CSV
- Fixed users canâ€™t see/know customerâ€™s WA number in Contacts
- Fixed users canâ€™t see previous messages in WA
- Fixed users canâ€™t get email verification
